name: Who took the screenshot? [Userstyles]
description:
"Is it an automatic screenshot, taken by our own Tyler McScreenshot, or was it possibly messed with by some unknown user?"
 -- calico

(But wouldn't that unknown user be the same user who posted the style?)
additional_info: You can't add <kbd>::before</kbd> and <kbd>::after</kbd> elements to an <kbd>IMG</kbd> element, so the information latent in the <kbd>src</kbd> URL must be exposed indirectly.
